channel.title: swiftui on Angelo Stavrow
channel.description: Recent content in swiftui on Angelo Stavrow

item.title: More WriteFreely Open-Source Fun: SwiftUI Multi-Platform App
item.description: Hot on the heels of the WriteFreely Swift Package, I’m kicking off another fun open-source project: building an official WriteFreely client for all Apple platforms as a SwiftUI multiplatform app.

item.title: Using Swift Packages in all Multiplatform SwiftUI App targets
item.description: SwiftUI multiplatform apps have both iOS and macOS targets, but adding a Swift Package dependency to your target via Xcode requires you to choose one. So how do you give both targets access to the package?
